title: @RIOT Got the $5 donation thing with the impact but what do I do now? in regards to the icon? :(
body: I'm really confused, I paid for it and stuff, how do i redeem the icon :O

replies.body:
Hey Monkey D Luffy, 

Once the campaign closes, you should have your icon. If you don't have your icon by November 23rd, please let me know.
Hey, I posted on the main boards someone else who had got the icon said to check the email i used for a code and it was there, I now have the icon, thanks though :)
